issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Record ClientId and CallId in EditLog to enable rebuilding retry cache in case of HA failover

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: create constant RpcConstants.CLIENT_ID_LENGTH rather than hard-coding 16 everywhere

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The magic number "16" is also used in ClientId.BYTE_LENGTH, so hard-coding magic number "16" is a bit confusing.
fields.summary: create constant MAX_CAPACITY in RetryCache rather than hard-coding 16 in RetryCache constructor

Yes, we should change maxCapacity to MAX_CAPACITY as usual.
